doc.title: Further Than North
doc.plot: Set in the 1920's, this is the true story of 19yr old Anne Hobbs, who accepted a position as the only schoolteacher in the remote village of Chicken, Alaska. Called "Tisha" by her students, Anne unwittingly enraged the white townspeople by consorting with Alaskan natives, eventually falling in love with one; but with grace, determination and bravery she continued to fight for equal rights for Native Americans and stand up for what she believed in.
